name: Knight Slash (BigRedChick, Virtet)
description:
Help the Knight to slay monsters in dungeon!

Controls:
arrows/WASD - movement and menu navigation
SPACE/ENTER - proceed in menu
ESC - return to menu
R - restart level

Most assets come from: https://0x72.itch.io/

Font: https://vrtxrry.itch.io/dungeonfont

Created by: Jacek Szelewski, Norbert Nawrotek
